p: Next, we examined the communities by phylum. Of 2057548 sequences, 19416 could not be classified, with the remainder distributed into 11 phyla. A total of 97.1% of the sequences belonged to only 5 phyla: Actinobacteria (7.9%), Fusobacteria (24.2%), Firmicutes (36.5%), Bacteroidetes (14.1%) or Proteobacteria (14.4%). We detected Spirochaetes, Synergistetes, Tenericutes, GN02, and 2 uncultured prokaryotes (TM7 and SR1) each at <1% of the total microbiota.
